TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void HyperlinkEventHandler(object sender, HyperlinkEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed HyperlinkEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle a <see cref="E:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.Hyperlink"> event.
Docs.remarks: ## Remarks For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
